data.enText: to state officially that you are no longer going to keep a title, position, etc.

data.chText: 宣布放弃要求 / 头衔 / 特权 / 权利

data.enText: to state publicly that you no longer have a particular belief or that you will no longer behave in a particular way

data.chText: 宣布放弃理想、原则、信仰等
声明放弃使用暴力的联合宣言
data.enText: a joint declaration renouncing the use of violence
to state publicly that you no longer wish to have a connection with sb/sth because you disapprove of them

data.chText: 他已经宣布与过去的伙伴拆伙。
data.enText: He had renounced his former associates.

simple_means.memory_skill: re 反 + nounc 讲，说 + e → 反过来说 → 否认

ex.chText: 他抛弃了妻子，拿走了他们所有的钱财。
ex.enText: He abandoned his wife and took all their money.

ex.chText: 船长向所有人下令放弃正在燃烧的船只。
ex.enText: The captain ordered everyone to abandon the burning ship.

synonyms.bx: 强调永远并完全放弃，不论自愿与否，也可能是为了逃避责任。

ex.enText: The Queen has no intention of abdicating her throne.

ex.chText: 英王爱德华八世于1936年退位。
他抛弃妻子后，和一位日本姑娘结婚了。
ex.enText: He deserted his wife and married a Japanese girl.

ex.chText: 那位母亲生下男婴后不久就把他遗弃了。
ex.enText: The mother deserted the baby boy soon after giving birth.

synonyms.bx: 多指放弃从前的职业、伙伴、伴侣及监护人资格等，有时带有内疚感。

ex.chText: 他取消了访问纽约的决定。
ex.enText: He has given up his decision to visit New York.

synonyms.bx: 普通用语，强调终止做某事，通常用来表示放弃某个计划、设计、工作、职位等。

ex.chText: 如果不给我加薪，我就不干了。
ex.enText: If I don't get a pay rise, I'll quit.

synonyms.bx: 常指停止做于己不利或伤害他人的事。

ex.chText: 他正式声明放弃公民权利。
她宣布放弃自己的宗教信仰。

synonyms.bx: 表示正式声明放弃职位、官衔、权力等。

ex.chText: 他只好放弃在议会的投票权。
ex.enText: He had to waive his right to vote in Parliament.

ex.chText: 地方政府拒绝取缔其规定。
ex.enText: The local government refused to waive its rules.

synonyms.bx: 表示正式宣布放弃权利、要求，或宣布取消规则、规定等。

tr: leave (a job, post, or position) voluntarily
example: She vacated the position when she got pregnant
The chairman resigned when he was found to have misappropriated funds

tr: give up, such as power, as of monarchs and emperors, or duties and obligations
example: The King abdicated when he married a divorcee

value.def: If you renounce a belief or a way of behaving, you decide and declare publicly that you no longer have that belief or will no longer behave in that way.

example.ex: After a period of imprisonment she renounced terrorism...
example.tran: 在被囚禁一段时间之后，她宣布放弃恐怖主义。

value.tran: 宣布放弃，抛弃(信仰或行为方式)

value.def: If you renounce a claim, rank, or title, you officially give it up.

example.ex: He renounced his claim to the French throne.
example.tran: 他正式放弃对法国王位的继承权。

value.tran: 正式放弃(要求、官阶或头衔)

partsOfSpeech.dec: an 加强 + nounc 讲，说 + e → 一再讲 → 宣布
announce 宣布；发表 + ment 表结果 → 通告
an 加强 + nunci 讲，说 + ate 做，造成，使… → 强调地说 → 宣言
de 毁 + nounc 讲，说 + e → 说诋毁的话 → 抨击
de 毁 + nunci 讲，说 + ate 做，造成，使… → 说诋毁的话 → 抨击
e 出 + nunci 讲，说 + ate 做，造成，使… → 讲出来 → 清楚表达
pro 前 + nounc 讲，说 + e → 在〔人〕前讲话 → 宣告
re 反 + nounc 讲，说 + e → 反过来说 → 否认
